text:
roup with high prevalence of diabetes (e.g. Indian) 
Obesity (patient BMI ≥35) 
Age ≥40 years 
Previous history Previous history of gestational diabetes (diabetes in a previous pregnancy) 
First degree relative with diabetes 
Previous unexplained intrauterine fetal death 
Previous baby with congenital abnormalities 
Previous macrosomic baby (birth weight ≥4 kg) 
Current pregnancy Polyhydramnios 
Fetus large for gestational age
